page.description: Provides the mechanism for moving between the administrative pages of the application.

section.description: The NAV_INT navigation component provides the mechanism for moving between the administrative pages of the application.
The NAV_INT navigation component is a has a vertical style and uses mouse over to open submenus.

section.title: Containers
